_sText:
Hello guys, this is a new map for counter strike source, zombie escape mod based on paradox.

the map has 3 stages with items and lasers in both stages.

-stage1: Team work abilities.

Players must works together to win this stage, u have 3 ways possible in this level.

blue way: defend against zombies attacks and wait that the red way open the ways for them.

red way: no zombies in this way but u must survive to the different traps to trigger and open the way for the blue way.

white way: items and traps, take items, survive and rejoin as fast as possible the blue way to help them.

Stage 2: solo abilities. Show your skill and u can win this level alone, this stage is divided in many parts where u must show ur skill and survive. 

btw u have possibilities to choose between « solo mod » and « team mod » if u succeed to reach the objective fixed in each part of this stage.

solo mod: it kill all cts who failed to reach the objective.

team mod: it bring all cts who failed to reach the objective on the next part to let them another chance if they still humans.

stage 3: Paradox. 

U will discover the map by yourself.

enjoy.
